channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Grass verge after bus stop, 22nd February
item.description:
No category. Damage to grass verge by private company. City fibre dug up the grass verge and destroyed it. They should be forced to replace the grass properly.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A40, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Group of potholes west of the bridge, 22nd February
item.description:
Group of potholes west of the bridge. There's quite a few on Swindon lane quite rapidly getting worse. Some of the old patches are coming away as well, the bridge bit could do with resurfacing completely or it will be like cobble

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Swindon Lane, Marle Hill, Cheltenham

item.title: 2 foot wide and 9 inch deep sink hole by bus shelter, 22nd February
item.description:
This is a large sink hole in the pavement which has recently appeared.It is dangerous as it is so deep.Its between the pub and the bus shelter on the Gloucester road at the cross road with st George's road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 140, Gloucester Road, Alstone, Cheltenham

item.title: Pothole getting worse, 22nd February
item.description:
Repeated patches in this area need a proper solution. The pothole is bad enough that cars are swerving into the opposite lane to avoid damage to their cars. Stop wasting money by temporary filling which only lasts a few weeks. Road stretch needs resurfacing asap. Further up the road there is a similar issue on the other side of the road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hyde Lane, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
